description: [Ember Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1003) has used publicly available tools such as MASSCAN and Acunetix for vulnerability scanning of public-facing infrastructure.(Citation: CISA GRU29155 2024)

external_references.description: US Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency et al. (2024, September 5). Russian Military Cyber Actors Target U.S. and Global Critical Infrastructure. Retrieved September 6, 2024.
